info.name: Resurs Merchant API
info.description:
# Resurs Merchant API

This collection consists of API:s offered to Resurs partners, giving them direct access to our credit and payment solutions.

request.description: Oauth2 Client Credentials Endpoint

item.description:
# Merchant API Service

This service provides API:s to retrieve information about your client, representative, or store.

For instance, you can use this service to get a list of personalized payment methods for a customer at a specific store.
